coreAttributes.name: leather bracelet
coreAttributes.description: A pair of leather restraints which lack a connecting chain. While doing nothing to impede movement, these bracelets nevertheless signify that the wearer is someone else's plaything or property.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the leather bracelets around [npc.her] wrists, before fastening the straps in place.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the leather bracelets around [npc2.namePos] wrists, before fastening the straps in place.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] the leather bracelets around [npc2.namePos] wrists, before firmly fastening the straps in place.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the leather bracelets from around [npc.her] wrists, before taking them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the leather bracelets from around [npc2.namePos] wrists, before taking them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] the leather bracelets from around [npc2.namePos] wrists, before yanking them off.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the leather bracelets around [npc.her] ankles, before fastening the straps in place.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the leather bracelets around [npc2.namePos] ankles, before fastening the straps in place.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] the leather bracelets around [npc2.namePos] ankles, before firmly fastening the straps in place.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the leather bracelets from around [npc.her] ankles, before taking them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the leather bracelets from around [npc2.namePos] ankles, before taking them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] the leather bracelets from around [npc2.namePos] ankles, before yanking them off.
